title: 'Little Fires Everywhere' | TV Concierge
description:
Bill Simmons explains to Amanda Dobbins why even though Reese Witherspoon's latest TV project, 'Little Fires Everywhere,' is very bad, he watched every single episode.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins
